description: A rotating machine whose shaft rotates asynchronously with the electrical field.  Also known as an induction machine with no external connection to the rotor windings, e.g squirrel-cage induction machine.

contents.name: AsynchronousMachine_asynchronousMachineType
contents.description: Indicates the type of Asynchronous Machine (motor or generator).

enumValues.name: AsynchronousMachine_asynchronousMachineType
enumValues.description: The Asynchronous Machine is a generator.

enumValues.name: AsynchronousMachine_asynchronousMachineType
enumValues.description: The Asynchronous Machine is a motor.

contents.name: AsynchronousMachine_converterFedDrive
contents.description: Indicates whether the machine is a converter fed drive. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909

contents.name: AsynchronousMachine_efficiency
contents.description: Efficiency of the asynchronous machine at nominal operation in percent. Indicator for converter drive motors. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909

contents.name: AsynchronousMachine_iaIrRatio
contents.description: Ratio of locked-rotor current to the rated current of the motor (Ia/Ir). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909

contents.name: AsynchronousMachine_nominalFrequency
contents.description: Nameplate data indicates if the machine is 50 or 60 Hz.

contents.name: AsynchronousMachine_nominalSpeed
contents.description: Nameplate data.  Depends on the slip and number of pole pairs.

contents.name: AsynchronousMachine_polePairNumber
contents.description: Number of pole pairs of stator. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909

contents.name: AsynchronousMachine_ratedMechanicalPower
contents.description: Rated mechanical power (Pr in the IEC 60909-0). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909.

contents.name: AsynchronousMachine_reversible
contents.description: Indicates for converter drive motors if the power can be reversible. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909

contents.name: AsynchronousMachine_rxLockedRotorRatio
contents.description: Locked rotor ratio (R/X). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909
